author: wglass
msg: major revision of web site and documentation to be more accessible to new users, removed outdated content, and cleaned it up.  Changed logo and converted layout to use CSS for cleaner design.

author: grantsmith
msg: tlddoc problems. In Linux, wildcard arguments to the ant tlddoc task are not expanded.

author: gdaniels
msg: This time I did set it to do its best with line-wrapping, and while it's not perfect I think it's not bad.  Also upped the limit for "*" imports so we get explicit imports.
